nodes.text: Weaponsmith, also known as Armstech, was an occupation that specialized in the construction, modification and repair of weapons. Daw Sembian was a weaponsmith. They worked hard metals, alloys and synthetic materials to craft blasters, blaster modifications and melee weapons.
Prior to the "New Game Enhancements" of 2005, Weaponsmith was one of many profession in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies.
